page.title: 19A TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: We surveyed the traffic at the mini_ roundabout in Laleham.This roundabout has three roads converging on it.One going to Staines,one goes to Shepperton and the third goes to Ashford. We were able to make the following observations.In the morning most of the traffic was going towards Staines, probably for people to work or shop. In the afternoon most of the traffic was making the return journey away from Staines.The bus service is very limited;we saw only one bus in our 30 minute survey.There were very few cyclists probably because they prefer to use the quieter roads along by the river.Most of the traffic was cars but there were also vans,lorries and a few bicycles.There were hardly any pedestrians.
